name: deimosrising
text: I like to imagine that this strip is chronologically after Teodor's blog entry "Ray is a moron" and Ray is wearing his cowboy office red boots.

name: catachresis
text:
Thank you for encouraging me to re-read said blog entry.
COWBOY OFFICE

name: zem
text: oh hell yes

name: stevegt500
text: ray's gun is named Tic-Tac

name: wonelove
text: "say hello to my little friend!"

name: asherdan
text: I like to think Ray wasn't really doing any work with that handsaw, just using it to point out what needed to be done while 'supervising'.

name: fineoakstructure
text: I think this is the first (only?) Asherdan comment I've seen that has no lames at all (as of 1/14/08).

name: heccibiggs
text: Yeah, totally. I was genuinely shocked.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Of course, now that we've drawn attention to it, it's much more likely to get lamed (a few days ago I came across another Asherdan post that hadn't been lamed up to a certain time.  Someone did the same thing I did, and then someone (else?) promptly lamed it.  Kinda weak...I mean, you can dislike the guy and all, but what's the point in laming him, I don't think he evens reads this shit anymore.

name: sp1derbaby
text: still... so... tempting...

name: achilleselbow
text: You know, I've read this far in the archive and also everything from the past 3 months or so, and I have yet to see any instances of Asherdan actually being as much of a dick as everyone says. All I've seen so far were pretty intelligent and witty posts of above average quality getting lamed for no reason. The self-righteousness of the people who do this bothers me far more than anything he's said. Maybe I'll be proven wrong as I read further, but it just surprises me that the people who use lames as personal attacks don't realize how... lame that is.

name: heccibiggs
text: Trust me. It comes.

name: heccibiggs
text:
ARGH someone fucking lamed it. What a dick.

You hear me? Whoever you are out there, you're a dick.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
"fosters." His name is fosters.

Sorry, but a dick move like that deserves to be looked up and called out.

name: farqussus
text: and BOO to atticusonline. you sheep.

name: woodenteeth
text: Shit beer, this must be expected of someone who takes it up as a handle.

name: gtc
text: It would be nice if there was a feauture that allowed you to ignore lames from people with low tastes.

name: ford
text: I kind of think you should be limited to like five lames per post you've ever made, too many people just run around laming people without talking at all, its like this silent mob of douchebags judjing someone else's conversation.

name: ford
text: oh judging i'm an idiot

name: fineoakstructure
text: I agree in principle.

name: rumblefish
text: The silent mob has apparently fired a warning shot across your bow.

name: fineoakstructure
text: His name is trialandterror; he has made 4 posts and has 4 lames, 1 chubby.  He is a winner.

name: sargasm
text: Ray probably could have caught Pat, but he stopped to pick up and re-don his captain hat first.

name: lizjones
text: Pat grabs Ray by the chest flab.

name: honesttom
text: A comment left by honesttom was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by nighttoad, Deusoma, shoinan, Circadin)

text: It probably has to do with Ray's headgear.

text: I think the "Village People" reference refers instead to the fellow wearing the captain's hat and cowboy boots.

text: What comic does Pat turn gay in?

text: It amuses me whenever Ray chases after one of his friends, yelling "Noooooo!"

text: One of the most EPIC overlaps in Achewood history. Magnolia ain't gott sh*t on Subway Wars/Beef In Heaven.
